page.title: 04RIDING STABLES
page.content: There are forty two acres of paddocks one dutch barn an indoor school and four stables.There are between thirty _thirty five horses,they are { {thoroughbred horses.}They are mainly {used }for national hunt and flat races.Fifteen people are employed.The horses are trasported all over the country and sometimes abroad.They do not breed the horses.They exercise them on all weather gallops and a grass gallop and generally on the downs.Lynch Farm has been a stable since nineteen sixty-five.The stable is mostly{national hunt}which involves the horses racing over hurdles or steeple chase fences.There are one or two horses running on the flat only and these often go on to jumping when they are older. {
